game.name: Minicars
game.description:
The biggest racing competition is in your town! What are you waiting for my friends? Join Minicars and be prepared to drive a beautifully-designed mini car on the highly challenging and tricky tracks! Choose your vehicle, tracks and get ready to ride your chosen vehicles on the tops of the mountains in this brand new racing game! There are some gaps and other dangerous areas to face with in the mountains and valleys. Play against the CPU or invite your friend to race!

Choose any mode between arcade and time trial in this one of the best HTML5 games for boys! Leave the speed while turning around the corners or jumping from one platform to another to prevent the collision and falling your car! Perform nice and earn points to upgrade your vehicles as you would have multiple cars to select and three levels to play with! You would have 1 player and 2 player game modes to choose from in this car race game.

Try to complete your race in the minimum possible time to score high in this cool driving game! Track how much laps you have completed and how many is pending by looking at the top left corner of the screen! If you need more fun and thrill to enjoy, do not forget to browse through our extensive collection of free racing games that are playable on multiple browsers and devices without download. Good luck to have a wonderful racing challenge in just a few clicks!
